arts.ttl: Newcastle United vs Arsenal: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 6, 2025
arts.sum: In a game where the home side usually comes out on top, Newcastle will look to continue that trend as they host Arsenal at St James’ Park . The Gunners will be hoping to win as they could be eight points behind leaders Liverpool before a ball has been kicked, but St James’ Park has always been a difficult trip for Mikel Arteta’s side during his tenure in charge of the North London side.

arts.sum: Arsenal will face Newcastle United in the Premier League this weekend in what promises to be one of the toughest fixtures of the campaign so far. Although the Magpies currently sit 13th in the league table, their position does not reflect the challenge they pose. arts.ttl: Newcastle vs Arsenal predictions: Gunners to claim Tyneside triumph
arts.sum: Arsenal have proven to be strong in defence so far this season and Ross Kilvington is backing them to leave Tyneside with all three points from their clash with Newcastle United.
